title: Dark Dungeon
mainText: If you discover an Event during exploration, you may put it into the Dark Dungeon instead of resolving it.{n}After your draw step, if there are events in the Dungeon, add 1 upkeep counter to it and pay {r:shinies=1} for every upkeep counter. If you can't, resolve all of the events in the dungeon.
flavourText: The cost of preparedness - measured now in gold, later in blood. - Unknown
